text:
Created attachment 24089
SVG with overlaid gradients

LinearGradients are rotated by twice the transform value when output is PDF.

See attached gradient, change the rotation transform amount, and generate PDF with batik-rasterizer to see results.

Additionally if the two gradients are stacked, one will not show in a PDF.   When generating a png, all results are as expected.
creator: joelhewitt@hotmail.com
